column1: Table 140-09001 : 1999/2000 Household Expenditure Survey - Average Monthly Household Expenditure by Commodity/Service Section/Group by Type of Housing
Food, excluding meals bought away from home (i.e. groups 2-26)
27. Rent, including rates and government rent
28. Management fees and other housing charges
56. Computers, telecommunications equipment and other durable goods
67. Purchases of and repairs to motor vehicles
69. Motor licences, insurance, instructor's fees, parking fees and tunnel tolls
89. Repairs to personal and household goods
90. Professional services, photo-printing, subscriptions and other services

(a) The Household Expenditure Survey (HES) is conducted at five-yearly intervals to collect up-to-date information on the expenditure patterns of households in Hong Kong for updating the expenditure weights used for compiling the Consumer Price Index. The 1999/2000 HES was conducted during the period from October 1999 to September 2000.
(b) Figures may not add up to totals due to rounding.

(c) Group 80 “School fees” covers “Kindergarten”, “Primary”, “Secondary”, “Craft and technician level”, “Post-secondary (including distance learning)”, “Private, vocational”, “Language courses” and “Other courses”. “Tuition schools and expenses on tuition” is also included.
(d) Statistics on medical expenses are subsumed in group 57 “Proprietary medicines and supplies” and group 82 “Medical services”.
